data.title: Port Stephens Koala Sanctuary, One Mile (updated prices 2024)
data.meta_description: Welcome to the Port Stephens Koala Sanctuary! Nestled in the picturesque coastal region of Port Stephens, NSW, our 8ha sanctuary offers a unique...
data.text:
Welcome to the Port Stephens Koala Sanctuary! Nestled in the picturesque coastal region of Port Stephens, NSW, our 8ha sanctuary offers a unique opportunity to connect with Australia's beloved koalas in a pristine natural environment. Step into a world of luxury and nature at the Port Stephens Koala Sanctuary's exquisite glamping tents. Surrounded by the tranquil beauty of the sanctuary, our thoughtfully designed glamping tents offer a unique blend of comfort and style. The spacious interiors of our tents are designed with your comfort in mind. With carefully selected amenities, including a king size bed, a private en-suite bathroom, a relaxing seating area, Mini-bar, wall mounted flatscreen TV, climate control air-conditioning and heating, every aspect of your stay has been carefully curated to ensure a truly memorable experience. Or indulge in the comfort of our hotel-style rooms, thoughtfully designed to provide a relaxing and cozy retreat. Each room is tastefully furnished, featuring modern amenities, full kitchen with appliances overlooking a tranquil bushland setting that ensures a restful stay. Sink into plush bedding and enjoy the convenience of en-suite bathroom facilities, creating a home away from home. As an added inclusion, guests receive an in-room continental breakfast hamper that you can enjoy at your own leisure. Start your day off right as you savor the flavors of delicious breakfast items in the comfort of your own tent/room. With a commitment to wildlife conservation, the Port Stephens Koala Sanctuary ensures first-class care to sick, injured and orphaned koalas with our dedicated teams working tirelessly to ensure that our koalas receive the best attention possible, promoting their well-being and supporting their natural wild behaviors. Whether you're a nature enthusiast, a wildlife lover, or simply seeking a memorable experience, a visit to the Port Stephens Koala Sanctuary promises a meaningful encounter with these iconic marsupials. So come, immerse yourself in our sanctuary, and create lasting remarkable holiday memories and directly contribute to the long term preservation of koalas in Port Stephens.

Couples particularly like the location — they rated it 9.5 for a two-person trip.

Distance in property description is calculated using © OpenStreetMap

Reception hours are as follows:

Monday-Sunday: 9:00-17:00

If you expect to arrive outside of these hours please contact the property in advance to arrange an afterhours key collection, using the contact details found on the booking confirmation.

Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.

Please inform Port Stephens Koala Sanctuary in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.

This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.

Quiet hours are between 22:00:00 and 08:00:00.

In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.

This property has identified that it does not require a short-term rental license or registration
